overview: Steve Ennen, Managing Director, Wharton Interactive Media Initiative & Wharton Lab for Innovation in Publishing, and a Lecturer in Marketing at The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania, is an award-winning journalist and new media professional pioneering online strategies for more than 15 years. At Wharton, Mr. Ennen is responsible for the development of curriculum in emerging media, lectures on emerging, interactive media strategies at the Wharton School for both MBA and Executive Education courses, and oversees relationships with the Wharton Interactive Media Initiative Corporate Partners. He advises marketing, media, and corporate enterprises on how to implement successful digital, social media/ social networking strategies.
